titleStmt.title: SII 14.59: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 59. (A.R. No. 220 of 1932-33.) PERUṄGUḶAM, SRIVAIKUNTAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE TIRUVAḺUDĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription dated in the 2+9th year of Śaḍaiya-Māṟaṉ registers a gift of 50 sheep by Kuḍiyaṉ Atulaguṇattaṉ of Nālkūr in Vēṇbu-nāḍu for burning a lamp to god Jaṭāmakuṭap-Perumāḷ of the temple called Tiruvaḻudīśvaram at Peruṅguḷam in Tiruvaḻudi-vaḷanāḍu, on behalf of his mother Śuvaraṉ-Āchchi. The aganāḻigaiyār of the temple agreed to burn the lamp.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . koccaṭaiyamā Iraṇṭu Itaṉetir Oṉpatu Ivvāṇṭu tiru vaḻutiva
ḷanāṭṭup peruṅkuḷattut tiruvaḻutiīśvarattu jaṭāmakuṭap perumāḷukku veṇpu nā
ṭṭu nālkūr kuṭiyaṉ Atulakuṇatteṉ Eṉ tāy cuvaraṉ Ācciyaic cārtti Ivvāṇṭu
dhanu nāyiṟu mutalāka cantirātityaval lerivatāka vaitta tirunontāviḷakku Oṉṟu . Oṉṟiṉu
kku Ittaḷi Akanāḻikaiyār vaḻi Aṭutta cāvāmuvāp perāṭu Aimpatu [.] Aimpatuṅ koṇ
ṭu Ittevar nārāya Uḻakkāl nicata muḻakku neyaṭṭi Ivviḷakku muṭṭāma lerippomāyi ṉo
m Ittaḷip paṇiceyyum Akanāḻikaiyom .
Digital edition of SII 14.59 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
